required_without: This field is only required when :name is not present!
alpha_emphasis_validation: This field accepts only letters with or without accent!
alpha_emphasis_space_validation: This field accepts only letters with or without accents and space!
alpha_lower_dashes_validation: This field accepts only lowercase, hyphen and underline!
alpha_lower_underline_validation: This field accepts only lowercase and underline!
enabled_disabled_validation: This field accepts only yes(1) or no(0)!
